shared.createAccount: Do you want to create an account?

home.title: Explore the world with Geotagger!
home.description: Geotagger is website that allows you to post picture and tag it on the map. Other user than try to locate it via Google Maps.
home.subtitle: Try yourself at Geotagger!
home.info: Try to guess the location of image by selecting position on the map. When you guess it, it gives you the error distance.
home.bestGuessesDescription: Your personal best guesses appear here. Go on and try to beat your personal records or set a new one!
home.newLocationsDescription: New uploads from users. Try to guess all the locations by pressing on a picture.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.description: Your name will appear on posts and your public profile.

signIn.title: Sign in
signIn.description: Welcome back to Geotagger. We are glad that you are back.

delete.message: This location will be deleted. There is no undo of this action.

profile.guessInfo: Start new game and guess the location of the picture to get the results here!
profile.uploadInfo: Upload new location with the click on button bellow or in navigation bar press the “+” button.

errors.default: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.incorrectPassword: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
